select pi_image,p_name,p_price,p_content,ps_regdate,ps_expiration ,ps_count,ps_price,ps_state,ps_update,c1_name,c2_name,p_division
from proimage inner join product on proimage.pi_num = product.pi_num inner join productsell on product.p_num = productsell.p_num inner join category2dep on product.c2_num = category2dep.c2_num inner join category1dep on category1dep.c1_num = category2dep.c1_num
WHERE productsell.ps_num =1
SELECT c2_num, c2_name, c1_num FROM category2dep
SELECT st_num, s_num, st_bnum, st_name, st_address, st_email, st_hours, st_cell, st_ceo, st_lat, st_lon, st_date, si_division FROM store WHERE st_num =1
SELECT prv_num, preview.c_num, p_num, prv_date, prv_image, prv_content, prv_scope, c_id FROM preview inner join customer on preview.c_num = customer.c_num WHERE preview.p_num =3
SELECT srv_num, sreview.c_num, s_num, srv_date, srv_image, srv_content, srv_scope, c_id FROM sreview inner join customer on sreview.c_num = customer.c_num WHERE sreview.s_num =3
